content: {A惊叹}The craftsmanship of this furniture is... impressive! It's perfectly safe for daily use. Here, I'd like you to have this Dough.
info: 感谢家装-莫白_莫白主引入语

content: If you have spare furniture you no longer need, you can sell it to <style=NpcName>Glenn</style> for some extra Dough. He'll make sure it goes to someone who truly needs it.
info: 感谢家装-莫白_莫白主引入语

content: Starting now, all the Inspo Cards you learn will go into your Inspo Card Binder, so you can easily check the required materials before crafting...
info: 感谢家装-莫白_莫白主引入语

content: {A想象}Oh, and if you're looking for something fancier, <style=NpcName>Loomi Mart</style> offers a range of ready-designed <style=Highlight>Blueprints</style> that you can purchase.
info: 感谢家装-莫白_莫白主引入语

content: {A灵光一现}Try using <style=Highlight>Loomi</style> to buy <style=Highlight>Blueprints</style> for some outdoor decor and have some fun with your Neighbors, hoho! I do hope you'll enjoy the freedom of decorating your planet to your liking!
info: 感谢家装-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Would you mind taking a look at your phone to receive the <style=Highlight>Inspo Card Binder</style> and a few furniture Inspo Cards?
info: 感谢家装-莫白_主流程文本II
